name: Amahri
text: My daughter tried the pizza and ate the whole thing. She loved it.

name: Erin Sedine
text: Amazing PIZZA. Pay for a pizza and put anything and everything on it w no additional cost. Very fast. Caesar salad was great. Fabulous staff. Will be dining here a lot in future!

name: Zackary Slager
text: Pretty solid overall. The staff is nice and the food is alright. They donâ€™t charge for sides of sauce or condiments which is much different from every other pizza place in town. They have quite the vast menu.

name: Tman Central
text: I love this place! Norico, the manager, made it an amazing experience. She just gave the place such a positive vibe. Define fly go again cause the food was really good.

name: andi nicpon
text: I don't usually review franchises but this location is amazing, the staff is extremely friendly and helpful. MOD pizza in general is really good pizza. Quality ingredients and fast service. I tried the boylan creme soda for the first time â€¦More

name: David Behnfeldt
text: Very friendly. Great atmosphere. Good food!

name: Tammy Former
text: The customer service was friendly and generous while they built your pizza or salads per you specifications.  The reason why I gave 4 stars is the pizza sauce was not seasoned enough which made it too tomato pastey tasting. We wished for â€¦More

name: R. VINCENT OPDYKE
text: Stopped in on a recommendation from a co-worker. This is like a Subway, except it's for pizza. Pick your crust, cheese, seasonings, over 30 choices of toppings, then they bake it. My daughter went with me and we each got our own pizza. Was definitely worth the 30 mile trip. We will surely stop here again when in the area.

name: Aud VanderBoon
text: Great staff! Very quick with yummy food

name: Robert Brouwer
text: Great place!! They noticed I've never been there and made me a MOD pizza expert. Also, effing delicious.

name: Allison Mocchi
text: Great service and energetic people! Love this pizza and how fast the service is!!

name: Dennis Robinson
text: Wow, beyond blown away by the quality of service, as well as the quality of pizza! The atmosphere is very modern / hippiesqe which is so cool. The pizza is beyond amazing, and made super quick. This is my new favorite pizza joint! ðŸ’¯

name: kendra Riley
text: This was a great meal!! Make your own pizza! Itâ€™s one price for any kind of pizza you make, unlimited toppings! And it tastes delicious!! And the staff was extremely friendly! I will definitely come here again!

name: Devin Bell
text: Manager was rude. Loudly berated customers. Did not feel like I was a valued customer.

name: Alyssa Cabang
text: Super friendly staff!! Pizza looks amazing!

name: Ricky Velazquez
text: Great service, great food, good prices! Love to personalize my pizza!

name: Lisa Smith
text: MOD Pizza is absolutely the best pizza in Grand Rapids, MI. The staff id very friendly and helpful. I love the fact you can add as many toppings as you want. The best part I don't eat pork and MOD's has a chicken sausage that is so good. If they had turkey pepperoni that would be great. I wish I had ine now

name: Lea Lucarelli
text: Thank you so much MOD Pizza! I placed an online order yesterday to have pizza for a staff meeting and didn't realize I messed up the time for the order. When I went to pick it up at the time I thought I selected, they said they had no order â€¦More

name: Raymond Harris
text: Like a subway for pizza you pick your toppings very short wait time and reasonable price

name: Emily Gilpin
text:
Normally this location has great customer service but this time was the worst I have witnessed in a while.
I ordered for pick up and it was supposed to be done at 8:08pm. I arrived at â€¦More

name: Ashlyn Dunham
text: Awesome pizza! My boyfriend and I both got a mini size along with cheesy garlic bread and it was just the right amount of food for us. The price was very reasonable as well. All of the employees were exceptionally nice and helpful. We will for sure be back!!!

name: Kim Guinn
text: Fast friendly service and even better pizza

name: Cheryl Schinske
text: Great service.  Great pizza!

name: Jody Toften
text: Excellent and fast pizza that I can get durning lunch

name: Millie hanebrink
text: I ordered the margarita pizza with cauliflower crust. Im diabetic and it has been challenging trying to find a good lower carb pizza. It was very good. Sauce was not sweet at all, pizza was very good quality. I will definitely be ordering this again.

name: Dr. M Keil
text: I always thought I just hated flatbread pizza. However, it turns out most places who make wood fired, flat bread pizza make them taste like garbage because they donâ€™t give you any good options for toppings. Being able to choose all the tasty stuff that MOD offers made my flatbread pizza delicious! Nice work mod. Iâ€™m a fan!

name: Kyla Joy
text:
Mont pizza is a great place to go for quick delicious pizza at a reasonable price! Friendly staff.
I appreciate that they have multiple different types of dough or crust, â€¦More

name: happy joy
text: Pizza delicious no charge for extra toppings put as many as you want. Love!

name: Jennifer Jenks
text: I'm a repeat customer at MOD Pizza and enjoy the friendly greeting, great food and cleanliness of this location.  Keep up the good work!

name: Kathy Duisterhof
text: Fantastic customer service, reasonable price. Our first time there, and the pizza wasn't just good, it was amazing. Thin, crispy crust (with option for thick crust), and great ingredient choices. Had the Jasper. It was fantastic. I highly recommend Mod Pizza and I hope you open locations in East Lansing for my collegiate kids.

name: John Galt
text: Can't say enough good things about Mod Pizza.   I've been eating at their restaraunts all across the country ever since I meet one of their employees hiking in the Rockies.   Their Mod Pizza is just the right size for one person.   I order â€¦More

name: John Jannereth
text: I hardly ever do a 5-star review however MOD Pizza is excellent and the service was outstanding â€¦More

name: Chris D
text: Have been here a few times now and love this place! If you're expecting it to taste like a typical chain pizza, don't go here. The staff has always been upbeat and friendly. The line seems to always move quickly enough. â€¦More

name: Trevor Muir
text: The pizza was amazing! Some of the best in town. I love that you get to pick out what you want on it, and that they cook it so fast. And the manager Josh was excellent. My family and I will definitely be coming back regularly

name: Daniel Glymph
text: A manager was rude and abrasive. Bad talking employees. Experience was miserable and will not be back.

name: Ann Still
text: Great food!  Great staff!  Family wanted pizza I did not.  Went there the pizza was so good and they offer salads also!  So many options to choose from!  Very good and would recommend to anyone!!

name: Chris Allison
text: Normally I do not do 5 star reviews but this place is awesome. The thin crust is just awesome and the employees were very nice as well. Great customer service and pizza.

name: David Sisco
text: MOD Size pizza with cinnamon dessert pizza with incredible cinnamon glaze dipping sauce!!

name: Matthew Dodgen
text: Excellent service, excellent pizza. If u don't like the pizza it's likely your fault, as they assemble it to your specs in front of you. Keep up the great work!!!

name: N
text: Amazing! The pizza and cakes and chip ice had me my happy place...I love the people who honestly I feel like they enjoyed their work ðŸ’œ They were accommodating and helpful especially when my kiddo had a hole in her cup, it was a quick fix â€¦More

name: Abbi B
text: If you're considering ordering "to go" here - avoid it. It seems like they have a really disorganized pick-up process where they'll serve people walking in before they'll serve people who placed their order 30+ minutes before. Attempted â€¦More

name: John and Melissa Meyer
text: Very clean location and friendly staff! Our pizza was great!

name: Don Searle
text: Always a great pizza. They have a new spicy red sauce in right now. Go check try it. It is great.

name: Kris Shannon
text: Went because we had a coupon and wanted to try it out. Seems to be very concerned with being hip, based on the decor. Ordering custom pizzas is confusing because ingredients are not posted clearly. Food okay, first bites especially, but by â€¦More

name: David Koslek
text: Good food,eazy,great deal!

name: Bear Hunter
text: Iâ€™ve been trying different pizza joints for 40 years now and this Pizza was/is one of the best I have ever had! Thin crust is amazing! Employees where very friendly and knowledgeable!! Super value!!

name: Haso Keric
text: slow service via ueats

name: jeff zimmerman
text: Great food friendly staff

name: John Lurie
text: Super friendly and welcoming staff and the cauliflower crust option is AMAZING! I highly recommend this place and getting the cauliflower crust.

name: Quinlan Septer
text: Great service! Kind and fast despite a huge lunch rush and online promo.

name: Sarah Kettelhut
text: Love this place! Great addition to Centerpoint! Awesome food and friendly service!

name: Andrew Van Liere
text: Pizza was made perfect, and i wish i would've got the guy's name who prepared it,  so i could thank him.

name: Zen Rasta85
text: Vegan options are good. Service was good. Reccomend this place 100%

name: Molly Alger
text: The pizza just wasn't good. The white sauce tasted bland and watered down. The toppings were low quality. We also got the garlic cheese bread and it seemed like gobs of minced garlic from a jar was just plopped on it. Nothing was really redeeming. I was really excited to try it, but MOD pizza didn't live up to the hype.

name: Kristine Selleck
text: great food, great service and our Pizza was baked to perfection!.  Nicely brown with no burn and just the right crisp.

name: Bob Sturdy
text: Really good, very consistent pizza each time I go

name: Jayden Kortman
text: Amazing, 10/10 would recommend, super nice people and great food!

name: Clark Van Halsema
text: Quick, friendly service--great pizza!

name: Mike Slagter
text: Very inviting, and the best pizza I've ever had.

name: Justin Groen
text: Great pizza, great concept with friendly staff.

name: MAHA REZEQ
text: Fast and yummy

name: Gerald Snapp
text: Good food

name: Michelle Goddard
text: We ordered MOD pizza Saturday evening & had Door Dash deliver. I had 2 slices of pizza, 3 hours later i started throwing up. I was sick for 2 days throwing up after i ate this pizza! Never Again!

name: Mike Tietz
text: Amazing pizza

name: Spot On Goals Advertising and Public Relations
text: Lots of employees standing around. Lots of not paying attention to customers in line. Pizza stayed on center display until the person who built it had t actually wall it over to the over herself. Guy who was supposed to cooking it just stood there telling his stories to the other staff.

name: Levi Cool
text: IT WAS VERY COOL!!!! AND STAFF WAS NICE, SO WAS THE FOOD!!!!!!!
